name: Telendra Softwares
overview:
Renowned as an eminent IT company providing a caravan of web-based products and services, TELENDRA softwares is a reputed web development company that was established in the year 2008 with its headquarters based at Spring Lake, NJ. Today, the company has proliferated its wings across the globe with its professional team operating from Israel as well. We have a creative team of skilled professionals who have in depth knowledge in various technologies including open source technologies and Microsoft technologies to service our valuable clients.

Fact Sheet

a) Substantial 4+ years in the business

b) 400 man years of cumulative organization experience

c) 150+ skilled professionals

d) 15,000 sq.ft Global Delivery Centre

e) Clients in 4 Continents and 50 Countries

f) 1000+ satisfied customers

g) Flexible and agile development methodologies

f) Well trained and qualified professionals

What we provide?

Web designing and development being the main company activity, we are also involved in web application development as well.We provide an array of solutions for all industry verticals including enterprises, healthcare, retail, e-governance, and education. Our solutions includes CRM, ERP, POS, Project management and collaboration, Employee performance management, Loyalty Programs, Channel management, Patient appointment scheduling, State data centre, Crime information management, e-learning solutions and much more. We provide cloud computing services to save your time and money.We are specially engaged in mobile application development in various platforms like iPhone/iPad, Android, Windows, and Blackberry with field expertise in cross platform development. Apart from our regular products and solutions, we provide internet marketing services that include SEO and SEM.

Our Secret of Success

The quality of our product speaks the valuable efforts we put into every aspect of product development and delivery. We provide immense support to our valuable clients across the globe with personalized approach marking their valuable part in our TELENDRA Family.
